name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions, specifically in the ad tech domain. Expertise in **microservices architecture** and **system design**, with a strong focus on **cloud** technologies including **Azure** and **AWS**. Proficient in ensuring optimal functionality through **high-performance databases** and **caching systems**, leveraging best practices in data structures and algorithms. Demonstrated ability in conducting thorough **code reviews** to maintain code quality. Well-versed in real-time bidding systems and developing reliable structures that enhance performance and efficiency. Additionally, brings hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and cloud-native applications, paired with a strong background in deploying solutions that meet compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about leveraging technology to create impactful systems.

•	Integrated real-time bidding systems and advanced **caching systems** to optimize data processing and delivery, enhancing user experiences with swift, IT-compliant responses.
•	Designed and maintained **cloud**-native solutions with **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, improving operational efficiency by delivering high availability and scalable infrastructure.
•	Developed high-performance databases utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis** for seamless data storage, ingestion, and querying, handling thousands of transactions daily in compliance with industry standards.
•	Conducted thorough code reviews and system design evaluations, employing data structures and algorithms to enhance performance and reliability across all projects.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams, integrating **Real-time** data sharing through advanced APIs while ensuring rigorous adherence to regulatory frameworks such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
•	Designed and deployed machine learning models using **Python** (scikit-learn, TensorFlow) for financial fraud detection, achieving an accuracy rate of over 90% in real-time scenarios.
•	Optimized deployment pipelines incorporating CI/CD strategies with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, allowing multi-environment deployments and reducing deployment times by 30%.
•	Utilized **ElasticSearch** and **Azure Cognitive Search** to enhance search capabilities across massive datasets, improving search speeds by 50% for both structured and unstructured data.
•	Enhanced product support for healthcare applications by applying system design principles, improving response times to critical data queries by 25%.

• Designed and implemented **microservices** architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing system design for a **high-volume transaction system**.
• Optimized data handling and caching systems to boost application performance, increasing throughput for financial operations by over **50%**.
• Conducted extensive code reviews to enforce best practices and ensure maintainable, scalable code across the team.
• Collaborated on real-time bidding strategies leveraging **Kafka, RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to support event-driven architecture and improve response times by **30%**.
• Developed high-performance databases and implemented data structures and algorithms to optimize data retrieval and storage for transaction monitoring.
• Created user-focused APIs and backend services that support dynamic front-end applications built with **React (18)** and **Next.js**, ensuring seamless integration and user experience.

• Integrated **AI/ML** capabilities using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** for fraud detection, improving anomaly detection rates by **25%** within banking transactions.
• Established and maintained documentation and technical specifications to facilitate ongoing development in **ad tech** projects.

Designed and optimized **microservices** for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout and order fulfillment, handling over **5000** transactions per minute.
Engineered real-time bidding features using **WebSockets**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking with latency under **100ms**.
Developed high-performance applications using **React** (**18**), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms, achieving a **95%** user satisfaction score.
Leveraged high-performance databases such as **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, with caching solutions improving response times by over **30%**.
Implemented advanced caching systems using **Redis** for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing database read pressure by **40%**.
Conducted rigorous code reviews and adhered to system design best practices, enhancing code quality and maintainability; reducing average bug counts in production by **25%**.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, facilitating controlled rollouts and A/B testing for major platform updates.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data and processing millions in transactions annually.
Applied role-based access control (**RBAC**) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
